txt.en: You have successfully defended the supplies!

'Blast, I knew it. I should have escorted that waggon myself! Of course we have the supplies, but at the loss of lives. We are here to help, not to hinder this war effort. I will make it up to these dwarves, I can promise you that.'
Defend the supplies from the raiders
You have left the supplies unguarded
The waggon is on the main road in Elderslade.\n\nYou should collect the supplies.
Bring the supplies to Hertha
The waggon is on the main road in Elderslade.\n\nYou should defend the supplies from the raiders.
<rgb=#FF0000>Do not leave the supplies unguarded</rgb>

'The waggon should have been here by now.'

You ask to what waggon Hertha is referring.

'There is a supply waggon coming from Limlók. Runerik is quite a punctual Beorning, so if the waggon is not here, I start to think that something is amiss! Would you search for the waggon in Elderslade for me? I would be happier if I knew the supplies were safe!'
The Missing Waggon
Hertha can be found at Shakal-atrâd.\n\nYou should bring the supplies to Hertha.
The waggon is on the main road in Elderslade.\n\nYou should more closely inspect the waggon.
Collected the supplies ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect the supplies ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
TBD Beorning 4
The waggon is somewhere on the main road in Elderslade.\n\nYou should search for the waggon.
DNT
Hertha worries that a waggon of supplies from Limlók has not reached Elderslade yet.
It looks as if the waggon broke down
Search for the waggon in Elderslade
This dwarf has been slain by an Orkish arrow!
Make a closer inspection of the waggon
